Package io.litmuschaos.generated.types

Interface CommonProbeProperties

All Known Implementing Classes:
K8SProbe, KubernetesCMDProbe, KubernetesHTTPProbe, PROMProbe
public interface CommonProbeProperties
Defines the common probe properties shared across different ProbeTypes

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Integer
    getAttempt()
    Attempt contains the total attempt count for the probe

    getEvaluationTimeout()

    getStopOnFailure()
    Is stop on failure enabled in the Probe
